metadata.name: Splash #4
metadata.description:
Freezing time in the moment of creation.
In Splashes, the search for a unique form blends with the search for oneself. By the time the splash is complete, there is a different person behind the screen.

By collecting one Splash you will receive an original physical painting from one of my collections.


Details:

PNG 3000x3750px
Blender + Cycles
